The Digital Dilemma:

Trying to escape the chaos

Technology was supposed to make our lives better. And in some ways, it does. But at the expense of feeling overwhelmed, drained, and 'buzzing'. And despite promises, it often adds more stress than it alleviates:

  • Stress of Modern Living

    We're severely outgunned: the world’s brightest minds converge around our electronics. The goal? Extract as much of our attention and nervous energy as possible.

  • Tech Overwhelm

    Despite regulatory limits per-device, devices are absolutely everywhere. We feel "plugged in" constantly, and our energy levels experience "death by a thousand cuts".

  • Health Risks of EMF Exposure

    Electromagnetic fields (EMFs) have long carried potential health risks even in small amounts, compromising our clarity and mental state. Yet the number of devices emitting them keeps going up.

Our minds and our focus are under constant EMF attack.
And 'eliminating tech' simply isn’t possible in our modern lives.
It’s no wonder many of us long for a reprieve from the digital chaos…

Finding Harmony:

Our digital sanctuary

We don’t need a digital detox. We need a digital shield. After all it’s not 'connectedness' we’re trying to avoid. It’s EMFs. So we can show up for the day calm, focused, and clear-headed:

  • Your authentic self, again

    Remember how creative, energetic and focused you used to feel before your world was filled with tech? We can feel that way again when we’re protected from part of our tech that holds us back.

  • Get your inner-peace back

    We can shield ourselves from exposure that takes our peace away. So we can be free of brain fog, anxiety, and that nagging feeling that makes us feel unable to make decisions.

  • Optimize your digital wellbeing

    Health and tech don’t have to be at odds. We can harmonize health and tech by minimizing harmful EMF exposure. Being well-connected should be a healthy thing. With the right shield, it can be.

Our minds deserve a sanctuary to thrive and create.
Especially when the world around us is buzzing with tech.
So we designed a solution that treats the cause, not the symptoms…

Discover the Client

Shield yourself from EMF exposure to maximise peace, focus and mental clarity in your high performance tech-powered world:

  • Customized EMF Protection

    The Client provides personalized EMF protection tailored to your unique energy field, ensuring comprehensive defense against harmful radiation from electronic devices and environmental sources.

  • Optimized for Enhanced Energy

    Harnessing the power of Earth Resonance Technology™, your Shield creates a harmonious bio-field that strengthens and stabilizes your energy levels, promoting greater vitality, mental clarity and resilience.

  • Refined for 24/7 Energy Support

    Wear your Shield confidently throughout the day, knowing it's working tirelessly to reinforce, stabilize, and amplify your energy vibration, offering continuous protection and support for your well-being.

Durable Satin Cord

Designed as a resilient alternative to traditional chains, our satin cord is chosen for its longevity and gentle texture. Soft metals like silver and gold are vulnerable to wear from harder materials, so it’s important to select a necklace that protects the pendant’s bail (the loop through which the cord passes). Our satin cord ensures your pendant remains in pristine condition for years to come.

Secure Tabs

Our meticulously hand-crafted tabs provide a reliable and elegant way to secure the domed shield. Each tab is made from premium materials, available in bronze, silver, white gold, or yellow gold, depending on the Shield level you select.

Domed Shield

Encasing our exclusive crystal matrix, the domed shield comes in two distinctive shapes: circle and heart. Each shield is crafted from the finest materials and is available in bronze, silver, white gold, and yellow gold. Our Level 5 Shields also offer gemstone options including diamond, ruby, emerald, and sapphire, to support your individual needs.

Our mission is to empower individuals to thrive in the digital age while staying grounded in the beauty of the natural world.

High performance individuals are normally faced with a choice: do I include more technological leverage in my life, or retreat for the sake of focus, clarity, and peace? We shouldn’t have to make that choice. We believe technology should enhance our well-being, not diminishes it.

That’s why we created the Shield: to help us feel the calmness we feel while out in nature, even while surrounded by electronics in the workplace. We want to do the best work of our lives, Without sacrificing peace in our lives.

That’s why we wear the Shield. Here to support you, — The Shield team
